title.narrative: SWE-2010-177 All Good Things Do Not Go Together - Analysing Contradictions between Peacebuilding and Democratization
SWE-2010-177 All Good Things Do Not Go Together - Analysing Contradictions between Peacebuilding and Democratization

description.narrative: This research project aims to identify how and why conflicts emerge in the wake of, and possibly are triggered by, peacebuilding and democratization interventions. In this light we will analyse i) the multidimensionality of peacebuilding, and ii) the ways in which external interventions interact with internal dynamics to create or exacerbate internal tensions that lead to resumed conflict. We will do this over two phases: in the short-term immediate aftermath of the peace agreement and in the long-term evolution of the new post-war order. The overall aim is to draw conclusions of relevance both for policy and theory-building regarding the rise and outcome of conflict-generation connected to the intervention itself. This is pursued against the contextual understanding that interventions frequently do not deliver the expected outcome.
